title: Have some problems with launch
body:
After update, I got a problem for game login, game stop at launch interface (I can't saw Launch button ). I don't know what things happen and try to reinstall the game, but it still doesn't work. I know that normally you will ask me click the "?" mark and try to repair the game, but actually I already tried it and it doen't answer me (maybe because I reinstalled the game, and I need download some date first). 

I also got some problems that "Bugsplatrc resource DLL not found".

Deeply hope you can reply soon.

Happy holiday.

replies.body:
There may be missing assets in your League directory, specifically because you're getting Bugsplat resource errors. I recommend grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to try a repatch. Simply load up the application and check the box for *Force Repatch* before hitting the **START** button. After the process finishes, launch League as admin by right-clicking on the shortcut and select *run as administrator*.

Let me know if this resolved your issue. ^.^
Unfortunately, this thing didn't work. I still couldn't find the "Launch" button.

I'm sorry to hear you're still having issues. I feel at this point, it would be best to run some system logs with our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support request**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can get back to you.

Let me know if you run into any issues.
yee same problem , nothingh won't show up when i open LoL
